snippet: The United States was disqualified in the 4x100 medley relay at the world championships in Barcelona for a swimmer leaving too early.
abstract: United States men's team is disqualified in the 4x100 medley relay at the world championships, costing team gold medal.
lead_paragraph: The United States was disqualified in the 4x100 medley relay at the world championships in Barcelona for a swimmer leaving too early.

headline.main: Disqualification in Relay Costs U.S. Men a Gold
headline.print_headline: Disqualification in Relay Costs U.S. Men a Gold
